channel.title: Beat the Clock #24
channel.description:
Time to Beat the Clock (or perhaps the jingle bells this time)!
This week's host is @moemx who will present a frosty challenge below and pick his favorites on Monday.
Let it snow!

item.title: Beat the Clock #24
item.dc:creator: moemx
item.description:
you were on the list with good reason so there’s not as much to say…

  • loving the vibe and intense atmosphere it creates, I was just really looking forward to some drums to give into that intensity. but since it didnt come (yet) I really knew I’d want this to be a full song.
  • nice buildup from 0:20 on, story gets really nice introduced there, steady eqing as well.
  • I could see it super rich later, with some instruments leading a dope lead melody getting layered a few times as well maybe and some highpassed sweepers…
  • let me know once you’re sat down with it (also for feedback if you want), I’d love to hear the process
  • reminds me of the character of stereofields ‚shadow‘ - don’t know if you heard it, here’s the link - similarities could be this steady buildup at the beginning, u know? and once the base drum comes in, it’s super deep and heavy (songs no advertising but sheer excitement about it)

Read full topic

item.title: Beat the Clock #24
item.dc:creator: Bausset
item.description:
Hi moemx, thx very much, I am so proud and pleased to be part of your shortlist, together with so nice artists and tracks. I was very impressed by the time you took to send messages and also to explain your choice, which is rare. Web is often quick, but you took the time … these BTC are special moments, very unique for creating music and sharing, and auxy is still more and more amazing, and the auxians are part of it. One last thing : I invite everybody to listen your so nice tracks and universe, personally, I am a fan…
Great Christmas to everybody. ️:snowman:️:champagne:

Read full topic

item.title: Beat the Clock #24
item.dc:creator: moemx
item.description:
voilà:

  • ok first of: your song is ultra dark and badass - awesome vibe in total
  • 0:04 is a nice intro to the coming short lead but a little to aggressive - it somehow sounds a little unwelcoming maybe?
  • 0:16 is nice. but a little reverb on the keys and maybe fuller chords would make it richer. and eq-ing that thing in would have been nice. that it’s a smoother transition u know?
  • also the drums in the intro could be a little more dynamic, with some variety in em
  • 0:30 I WAS SO LOOKING FORWARD TO THAT DROP. that kills, big time - nice! BUT: how about a short 1 bar scene with just some high piched smaller instruments that give us time to breathe before that drop… that would have made that anticipation even higher and thus even more intense.
  • chorus: delay on the keys. one simple trick. delay intensifies, even consider bringing that delay in the scene before (the breather) with automations ?.. maybe that could work…
  • the baselines are dope but one of them is shadowing the kick too much. a dope badass beat like that deserves a proper kick you can feel! taking that out in the chorus… overshadowing it too much weakens intensity a little I think
  • 1:03 a fully high passed and only lowpassed sweeper. to smoothe the transition to the outro
  • and still some part of the dope badass chorus in the outro that slowly eqs away
  • ending the track (last scene of the outro) with the beginning in some sort would maybe help end the story right, un know what I mean? connect beginning and ending - like dramaticly
  • consider making a full version. this badass track deserves to be perfected

Read full topic
